SELECT c.COURSE_SEQ AS courseSeq, c.TITLE AS title, c.INTRODUCTION AS introduction, c.UPLOAD_DATE AS uploadDate, c.IS_PUBLIC AS isPublic, u.NICKNAME AS userName FROM COURSE c JOIN USERS u ON c.USER_SEQ = u.USER_SEQ
c.IS_PUBLIC = 'Y'
AND c.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND u.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY
c.UPLOAD_DATE ASC c.UPLOAD_DATE DESC c.TITLE ASC c.TITLE DESC c.UPLOAD_DATE DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

c.IS_PUBLIC = 'Y'
AND c.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
